title: How to eat like a Republican
content:
August 24, 2004 -- NEW arrival in bookstores is, "How to Eat Like a Republican." Subtitle: "Hold the Mayo, Muffy, I'm feeling Miracle Whipped Tonight."   
   
Aside from feasting on John Kerry's bones, it's recipes from those partial to Lincoln and Reagan and macaroni and cheese. Like John McCain's Mean Beans, Gov. Pataki's Empire Apple Muffins, Rush's [Limbaugh] Mom's Fluffy Potato Casserole, Pat Buchanan's Buffalo Right Wings, Bob Dole's Kansas Whole Wheat Honey Bread, which he presumably bakes those spare moments he isn't sampling Viagra or stuffing Elizabeth.
author: dan

comments.content:
You mean like this, Dan?   
   
(There's more where that came from at [http://giambarba.com/caricatures.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518052819/http:/giambarba.com/caricatures.html) ![Presidential Fun Couple](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518052819im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/30/47557.jpg)

How to eat like a Republican:   
Eat lots of rich, gravy-laden food and let it Trickle Down your cheek and the side of your face will be well supplied. Eventually, it will drip off your supplied side and, if you are not taxed too much, you will have fed the hungry.

Paul,   
It looks like Bob Dole is just trying to be a Stand-Up guy ;-)
